Container.Description: Two in One container with both SickBeard and SickRage[br]Note only one can be run at any given time[br]To select Sickrage click advanced view and change the SICKRAGE variable to 1 Will default to SickBeard otherwise[br]EDGE = 1 will update the container with the latest git pull on startup with your choice of either sickbeard or sickrage[br][br][br]Folder setup is /tv for your local tv shows folder, /downloads for where SAB etc puts completed downloads and /config for saving config files.[br][br]Whilst you can only run only one of these programs at once, you can switch between by stopping the container and changing the SICKRAGE variable to 0 for sickbeard and 1 for sickrage
